android.health.pedometer
Class ExcerciseSessionList

java.lang.Object
  android.health.pedometer.ExcerciseSessionList

public class ExcerciseSessionList
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for storing, managing, and allowing access to the history of all the user's exercise sessions recorded by this session. Ultimately, all non-pedometer components of the application that wish to access pedometer-related information must use this class to access the data further down.

Author:
Joel Botner

Constructor Detail

ExcerciseSessionList

public ExcerciseSessionList(Activity theActivity)
Method Detail

addSession

public ExcerciseSession addSession(int travelType,
                                   boolean useGPS)
Creates a new ExerciseSession according to the specified type and monitoring method.

Parameters:
travelType - - The type of exercise the user is doing: 1 for walking, 2 for running, and 3 for biking.
useGPS - - Boolean value whether to use the GPS to monitor the exercise or not. If the GPS is not used, the application will fall back to using the built-in accelerometer.
Returns:
The new ExcerciseSession created.

deleteSession

public void deleteSession(ExcerciseSession session)
Removes the specified ExerciseSession from the user's history.

Parameters:
session - The specific session to remove.

getExcerciseStatistics

public java.lang.String getExcerciseStatistics(java.lang.String date)
Generates and returns key statistics about all recorded exercise from a certain date onwards.

Parameters:
date - - The date of the exercise session(s) to begin analyze
Returns:
A String containing the core statistics about all exercise sessions from this point onwards.

getExcerciseSession

public ExcerciseSession getExcerciseSession(java.lang.String date)
Returns the ExcerciseSession that occurred on a specific day and sequence number.

Parameters:
date - - The date of the desired exercise session (with the session number for that day concatenated e.g. "4-4-2011 3" for the third session on April 4th, 2011).
Returns:
The ExerciseSession specified by that specific date string, null if not found.
